Design Input¶

class design.designinput.DesignInput(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

designinput.py aims to instantiate all primitive classes of a parametric UAV based on user-input of configuration type. Other user-inputs cover global aircraft attributes and allow changes either through the use of the ParaPy GUI or through the use of the userinput.xlsx file.

Parameters:
  • performance_goal (str) – The goal for which the UAV should be optimized (i.e. ‘endurance or ‘range’)
  • goal_value (float) – The value pertaining to the endurance goal in SI hour [h] or range in SI kilometer [km]
  • weight_target (str) – The target weight for which the Class I estimation should be run (i.e. ‘payload’ or ‘mtow’)
  • target_value (float) – The value pertaining to the target weight in SI kilogram [kg]
  • payload_type (str) – Sets the payload type that will be instantiated in the UAV (currently only ‘EOIR’)
  • configuration (str) – Sets the base configuration for the UAV (currently only ‘conventional’ is supported)
  • handlaunch (bool) – Sets the design point of the UAV to be hand-launchable
configuration¶

Sets the base configuration for the UAV (currently only ‘conventional’ is supported)

get_userinput[source]¶

An attribute, that when evaluated, reads the input excel file present in the working directory and updates input values of the Aircraft class

Returns:Set of updated values which over-write the default values defined in the ParaPy Input classes above
goal_value¶

The value pertaining to the endurance goal in SI hour [h] or range in SI kilometer [km]

handlaunch¶

Sets the design point of the UAV to be hand-launchable

open_documentation[source]¶

Allows the user to open the documentation from within the GUI for reference or help.

Returns:KBE App Documentation
payload_type¶

Sets the payload type that will be instantiated in the UAV (currently only ‘EOIR’)

performance_goal¶

The goal for which the UAV should be optimized (i.e. ‘endurance or ‘range’)

target_value¶

The value pertaining to the target weight in SI kilogram [kg]

weight_target¶

The target weight for which the Class I estimation should be run (i.e. ‘payload’ or ‘mtow’)

design.designinput.valid_payloads()[source]¶

Returns all valid payloads in the payloads directory for the field payload_type

Return type:list
